strongs_def: akin to G1125 (χάραξ) through the idea of scratching); a stake, i.e. (by implication) a palisade or rampart (military mound for circumvallation in a siege)
outline:
1. a pale or stake, a palisade
  2. a palisade or rampart
    1. pales between which earth, stones, trees, and timbers are heaped and packed together
